title: programms for skins
body: Hey i have seen from streamers having programms so they can have any skin they want but they can only see it and nobody else. Is it considered third party programm or is it allowed?

replies.body: Anything that alters the way the game is played or the game files wouldn't be allowed. Since a program would have the unlock that skin for you to use it, there's a pretty good chance that it could get you banned. You can always refer to our [**third party program faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) for all the subtleties.
